entry.title: 3M imperial Marine
entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M Auto
Type: Paint Correction
Price: 43.99 - 179.99 (2 variants)

3M Marine Compound and Finishing Material

3M Marine Compound and Finishing Material removes scratches, oxidation, stains, swirl marks and other blemishes that are robbing your boat of its beauty. This 'two-in-one' compound and polish eliminates common imperfections from fiberglass and marine gel coats. Boats look stunning with refreshed high gloss exteriors when compounded and finished with this special formula.

Does Double Duty for Marine Detailing

3M Marine Compound and Finishing Material restores the lustrous beauty of boats by eliminating oxidation, scratches, scuff marks and other surface blemishes. Its unique formulation combines a compound with finishing polishes, which does a double duty task of removing imperfections and polishing in one application. The simplicity and time savings of a 'two-in-one' product with compound and polish makes it a favorite among boat detailing professionals.

The compound and finishing material is highly rated for scratch removal. Use this product to remove P600-P800 dual action or P1000-P1200 sand scratches with a wool compounding pad. You may also use an air or electric buffer (1500-2500 Max. RPM) equipped with 3M Compound Buff Pads (sold separately). It has a fast cut and delivers a swirl-free finish.

Details

  • Removes light to heavy oxidation.
  • Eliminates sand scratches and swirl marks.
  • Unique formula combines compound and polish.
  • Fast cutting action saves time.
  • Delivers a high gloss finish.

Directions for Use

Before using this product, please reference Product Label and/or Safety Data Sheet for Health and Safety Information:

  • Shake container before using.
  • Apply sufficient material to surface to work a 2 foot by 2 foot area. To minimize slinging, spread the compound over the surface with the compounding pad before starting the machine.
  • Start machine using light to medium pressure.
  • Reduce pressure as compound starts to dry, allowing material to polish surface.
  • Repeat, only if necessary, to remove any remaining sanding marks or swirls.
  • The combined benefits of a compound and polish in one product mean you spend more time relaxing on your boat out on the water and less time detailing it. Enjoyment is what having a boat is all about!

Details

  • Removes light to heavy oxidation.
  • Eliminates sand scratches and swirl marks.
  • Unique formula combines compound and polish.
  • Fast cutting action saves time.
  • Delivers a high gloss finish.

entry.title: Copy of 3M Auto Trizact Hookit Foam Discs P8000 ***
entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M Auto
Type: Miscellaneous
Price: 11.99

3M Trizact Abrasives used in paint defect removal and refinement help reduce compounding and buffing time. They consist of precisely-shaped three-dimensional pyramids distributed uniformly over the surface of the disc. As these pyramids wear, fresh, sharp mineral is constantly exposed to the work piece, resulting in faster, more consistent performance cutting throughout the life of the discs. 3M Trizact Discs & Sheets allow you to have more consistent finishes with better cut, finish, and a longer life. Using a 3M Trizact Hookit Foam 1000, 1500, 3000, 5000 and 8000 grade discs will reduce your buffing time and eliminate the need for a wool compounding pad, making the job easier and faster than the traditional process!

Listing for single disc.

entry.title: 3M Auto Trizact Hookit Foam Discs P1000 ***
entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M Auto
Type: Sanding
Price: 5.99 - 9.99 (2 variants)

  • P1000 Foam Discs are Part of the 3M™ Perfect-It™ Paint Finishing System for high gloss and deep paint finishes
  • P1000 Foam Discs are Ideal for refining sand scratches to help reduce the amount of time spent compounding
  • 3M™ Hookit™ Attachment System allows for fast, easy change-outs with 3M™ Hookit™ Disc Pads and Soft Interface Pads
  • Helps improve finishing efficiency and lowers process time
  • Patterned, precise mineral structures provide a combination of fast cut and consistent finish
  • Long-lasting, even-wearing abrasive can help reduce extra material costs

The 3M™ Trizact™ Hookit™ Foam Abrasive Disc removes fine sand scratches on painted surfaces to reduce the amount of time spent compounding. Three-dimensional mineral abrasive structures are distributed uniformly across the disc surface and wear evenly for consistent finishes, longer disc life and reduced material costs. Foam backed discs are part of the 3M™ Perfect-It™ Paint Finishing System.

As part of the 3M™ Perfect-It™ Paint Finishing System, 3M™ Trizact™ Hookit™ Foam Abrasive Discs help reduce the time and material required for compounding, creating significant operating efficiencies during spot and large panel repairs.

 

Suggested Applications

  • Used to refine sand scratches on a wet or dry finishing surface
  • Designed to be used as a part of the 3M™ Perfect-It™ Paint Finishing System

entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M Auto
Type: Miscellaneous
Price: 9.89 - 11.49 (2 variants)

3M™ Trizact™ Hookit™ Blending Discs are used to scuff sanding blend panels prior to painting. The soft foam backing preserves orange peel for better texture matching, and can be used damp to prevent loading.

*Price per unit. 15 blending discs/box.

entry.title: 3M Auto Sun Gun II Colour Matching Light Kit
entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M Auto
Type: Equipment
Price: 849.99

The 3M™ PPS™ Sun Gun™ II Colour Matching Light Kit offers advantages like helping to choose the correct variant or alternative colour chip and verify coverage and colour match. The Sun Gun can also help with detail to identify post-paint defects such as swirl marks, burn through, sand scratches and dirt nibs, and can assist in clearly identifying damaged areas prior to writing the estimate. The kit can also help to identify pre-paint defects such as pin holes, sand scratches and solvent pop. It delivers long battery run time, a wider, more even light beam, an improved battery charger and a more durable bezel comparison to the legacy model.

entry.title: 3M Auto Hook-It Low Profile Sanding Disc Pad
entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M Auto
Type: Equipment
Price: 24.49

3M HOOKIT LOW PROFILE SANDING DISC PAD 3" X 1/2"
SKU: 20350
Company: 3M

3M™ Hookit™ Low Profile Sanding Disc Pads are firm yet flexible to provide versatility for flat sanding applications and are designed to securely hold on a random orbital sander. Low profile firm density foam and blunt 35 degree tapered edge provide durability and an aggressive cut. Use this disc pad with coarse grades where good leveling is needed. Multi-hole pattern evacuates dust better than 5- or 6-hole products.

The 3M™ Finesse-It™ II Finishing is designed to remove minor scratches and light oxidation while producing a high-gloss wet look finish on fibreglass and painted surfaces.
  • Contains no wax or silicone.
  • Removes swirl marks after compounding, while leaving a glazed finish.
  • Finesse-It Can remove grade micro fine 1500 sand scratches.

entry.title: 3M Auto Green Masking Tape
entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M Auto
Type: Miscellaneous
Price: 6.99 - 15.99 (2 variants)

3M GREEN MASKING TAPE 3/4"
SKU: 26334
Size: 18 millimeters
Company: 3M

High performance masking tape for automotive refinishing applications. This green coloured tape has excellent conformability, transfer resistance and is resistant to bleed through. This product goes on quickly and easily, sticks at a touch and stays put. Hugs curves and provides outstanding paint lines. Also has better UV resistance than traditional masking tapes. Perfectly balanced to give outstanding masking results.

Specifications:

  • Colour: Green
  • Length: 55 Linear Yard
  • Thickness: 6.6 Milli-inch (mil)
  • Width: 18 mm (3/4 inch)
  • Adhesion to steel: 38oz./in width. Tensile: 25lbs/in. Tape thickness: 6.7 mils. Temp range: 250F(121C) for 30 minutes.
